item.title: Flipkart
item.description: Since January 2021, I have been working at Flipkart, Jan 2021 to June 2021 as a Intern and since July of same year as a full time Software Development Engineer. Team Here at Flipkart, I am part of Jeeves team which works to imporve experiece of customers and technicians for various post delivery services provided by Fk.
